history: Don-goon is named after the holy Don-goon, the legendary founder of Korea in the year two thousand three hundred thirty three B.C..

start.shortDescription: Form a parallel ready stance on the intersection of the A.B. and C.D. lines, facing D..
start.fullDescription: Start in an attention stance on the intersection of the A.B. and C.D. lines, facing D.. Move the left foot to B, and form a parallel ready stance toward D..

movements.shortDescription: Form a right L-stance toward B. while executing a middle knife-hand guarding block.
movements.fullDescription: Move the left foot to B. to form a right L-stance toward B, while executing a half-facing middle knife-hand guarding block to B..

movements.shortDescription: Form a right walking stance toward B. while executing a high front punch with the right fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the right foot forward to B. to form a right walking stance toward B, while executing a full-facing high front punch to B. with the right fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left L-stance toward A. while executing a middle knife-hand guarding block.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the left foot and turning clockwise, move the right foot to A. to form a left L-stance toward A. while executing a half-facing middle knife-hand guarding block to A..

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward A. while executing a high front punch with the left fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the left foot forward to A. to form a left walking stance toward A. while executing a full-facing high front punch to A. with the left fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward D. while executing a low block with the left outer forearm.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to D. to form a left walking stance toward D. while executing a half-facing low block to D. with the left outer forearm.

movements.shortDescription: Form a right walking stance toward D. while executing a high front punch with the right fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the right foot forward to D. to form a right walking stance toward D. while executing a full-facing high front punch to D. with the right fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward D. while executing a high front punch with the left fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the left foot forward to D. to form a left walking stance toward D. while executing a full-facing high front punch to D. with the left fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a right walking stance toward D. while executing a high front punch with the right fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the right foot forward to D. to form a right walking stance toward D. while executing a full-facing high front punch to D with the right fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a right L-stance toward E. while executing a twin forearm block.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to E. to form a right L-stance toward E. while executing a half-facing twin forearm block to E..

movements.shortDescription: Form a right walking stance toward E. while executing a high front punch with the right fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the right foot forward to E. to form a right walking stance toward E. while executing a full-facing high front punch to E. with the right fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left L-stance toward F. while executing a twin forearm block.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the left foot and turning clockwise, move the right foot to F. to form a left L-stance toward F. while executing a half-facing twin forearm block to F..

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward F. while executing a high front punch with the left fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the left foot forward to F. to form a left walking stance toward F. while executing a full-facing high front punch to F. with the left fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward C. while executing a low block with the left outer forearm.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to C. to form a left walking stance toward C. while executing a half-facing low block to C. with the left outer forearm.

movements.shortDescription: Maintain the left walking stance while executing a rising block with the left outer forearm.
movements.fullDescription: While maintaining a left walking stance toward C, execute a full-facing rising block to C. with the left outer forearm.

movements.shortDescription: Form a right walking stance toward C. while executing a rising block with the right outer forearm.
movements.fullDescription: Move the right foot forward to C. to form a right walking stance toward C. while executing a full-facing rising block to C. with the right outer forearm.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward C. while executing a rising block with the left outer forearm.
movements.fullDescription: Move the left foot forward to C. to form a left walking stance toward C. while executing a full-facing rising block to C. with the left outer forearm.
Move the right foot forward to C. to form a right walking stance toward C. while executing a full-facing rising block to C. with the right outer forearm.

movements.shortDescription: Form a right L-stance toward B. while executing a middle outward side strike with the left knife-hand.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the right foot and turning counterclockwise, move the left foot to B. to form a right L-stance toward B. while executing a half-facing middle outward side strike to B. with the left knife-hand.

movements.shortDescription: Form a right walking stance toward B. while executing a high front punch with the right fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the right foot forward to B. to form a right walking stance toward B. while executing a full-facing high front punch to B. with the right fore-fist.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left L-stance toward A. while executing a middle outward side strike with the right knife-hand.
movements.fullDescription: Pivoting on the ball of the left foot and turning clockwise, move the right foot to A. to form a left L-stance toward A. while executing a half-facing middle outward side strike to A. with the right knife-hand.

movements.shortDescription: Form a left walking stance toward A. while executing a high front punch with the left fore-fist.
movements.fullDescription: Move the left foot forward to A. to form a left walking stance toward A. while executing a full-facing high front punch to A. with the left fore-fist.

finish.shortDescription: Return to a parallel ready stance facing D..
finish.fullDescription: Pivot on the ball of the right foot, bringing the left foot back to B. turning counterclockwise to form a parallel ready stance toward D..
